content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Mister Abbasi. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find this apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. So, let's discuss the rental price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your time and effort in showing me this apartment. Regarding the rental price, I'm looking for a fair and reasonable amount considering the location and amenities. Would you be willing to start at a lower price point?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly, Mister Abbasi. I'm always open to negotiation. However, I must emphasize that this apartment is brand new and in a prime location, which justifies a higher price. Would you be able to offer a price that reflects its value?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the apartment is new and well-located, Mister Schmidt. I'm willing to pay a fair price for it. How about we start with a figure that we can both agree on? I'm thinking of something around 750 Euros per month. What do you think?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mister Abbasi, your offer is quite low for an apartment of this quality and location. I'm afraid I cannot accept that. However, I'm willing to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle? I propose 900 Euros per month. What is your counter-offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your counter-offer is more aligned with my expectations. I'm still interested in discussing further. How about we try to find a price that reflects the value of the apartment while also being within my budget? I'm thinking of a price around 850 Euros per month. Would that be acceptable to you?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mister Abbasi, your new offer is closer to my expectations. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I propose 875 Euros per month. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. What is your final offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your persistence in finding a fair price is commendable. I'm willing to make one final offer to seal the deal. How about 890 Euros per month? This would be my absolute highest offer, considering the apartment's location and amenities. Would you be willing to accept this price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mister Abbasi, your final offer of 890 Euros per month is very close to my asking price. I'm willing to accept this as a sign of goodwill and to establish a long-term relationship with a tenant. I agree to the price of 890 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful news, Mister Schmidt! I'm delighted to hear that we have reached an agreement. I agree to the price of 890 Euros per month.
